channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped furniture., 20th December
item.description:
Woman at 14 Brunswick villas just dumped a smelly mattress and furniture at gables close.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gables Close, Camberwell, Greater London

item.title: Leaves and berries on pavement, 20th December
item.description:
Tree at end of Suffield Road shedding leaves and berries onto the pavement, which is causing a pedestrian hazard, which also backs onto primary school

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Suffield Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 36 Mill Lane NW6 1NR, 20th December
item.description:
Hit the pothole yesterday 19/12/2025 evening and I heard a horrible clunk. I noticed that my car pulling to one side and my steering wheel is crocked. I had to return to the location the following day to get the right location for it to report it ,so hopefully responsible Council can fix it!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Mill Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Hi there, I have submitted on a number of occasions a request to plant a new tree outside our house at 22 Fairway. We in fact had a tree there a number of years ago but maintenance teams ie Thames Water etc removed the tree to allow for works. Please Bromley Council we need new tree planting trees on this side of the street to make the street green again! I have noticed lots of trees have been planted around other roads close to Fairway! Thank you and Merry Christmas!, 20th December
item.description:
Please see above.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Fairway, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
